name: Demons ate my Ice Cream!
description:
Submitted for the Septermber 2021 Ice Cream Jam, made in just two weeks!

Version 0.9 (no sound, doing that tomorrow!)

The world is in its final days, those who can fight back the demons still have to work though. Throw many types of ice cream at the demons, see how long you can last!

Exploding ice cream, Fast ice pops, Rolling Ice cream bowls, Ice Cream Sandwich walls and more!

'Not the cold... Please spare me.'

-Joel Gray - Game Designer/Scripting

@JoelTheGray

-Cristian Acebes Prado - Concept Artist

@metallitas

-Finn Burton - Music

@Finnceeby
